title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka Slums
description: Providing warm clothes to underprivileged families in the slum areas of Dhaka.

title: Helping Hand in Dhaka City
description: A campaign to collect winter clothes and distribute them to homeless individuals in Dhaka city.

title: Blankets for Chattogram Hills
description: Distributing blankets to tribal communities in the hilly areas of Chattogram.

title: Winter Kits for Coastal Chattogram
description: Providing winter kits to fishermen and coastal families in Chattogram.

title: Winter Relief for Sylhet Tea Gardens
description: Supporting tea garden workers in Sylhet with winter essentials.

title: Warm Clothes Drive in Sylhet Villages
description: A donation drive to distribute warm clothes to rural villages in Sylhet.

title: Warm Clothes for Rajshahi Families
description: Providing warm clothes to underprivileged families in Rajshahi.

title: Blankets for Rajshahi Farmers
description: Distributing blankets to farmers in rural Rajshahi to protect them from winter cold.

title: Winter Clothing Drive for Khulna Orphans
description: Distributing winter clothing to orphanages in Khulna.

title: Warmth for Khulna Villages
description: Collecting and providing warm clothes and blankets for vulnerable families in Khulna.
